testcase.name: To verify presence of important labels
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "https://openweathermap.org/".......................passed Then "Weather" weather label should be present..............................passed Then "Maps" map label should be present.....................................passed Then "Price" price label should be present..................................passed Then "Station" station label should be present..............................passed Then User close the URL.....................................................passed

testcase.name: To verify when incorrect city is entered
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "https://openweathermap.org/".......................passed When User enters invalid city "InvalidCity" in search box...................passed And click on Search button..................................................passed Then Not found message should be displayed..................................passed Then User close the URL.....................................................passed

testcase.name: To verify when correct city is entered
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "https://openweathermap.org/".......................passed When User enters valid city name "Mumbai,IN" in search box..................passed And click on Search button..................................................passed Then Weather details should be displayed....................................passed Then User close the URL.....................................................passed

testcase.name: To verify user is not able to Sign In with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to "https://openweathermap.org/".......................passed And User clicks on Sign In..................................................passed When User enters invalid username as "Kasturi@gmail.com"....................passed And User enters invalid password as "password"..............................passed Then User should not be able to login.......................................passed Then User close the URL.....................................................passed
